sys_ui_macro.description: This is responsible for setting the background of the form.
sys_ui_macro.name: mc_proposal
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

.touch_scroll{
	background:url("/x_902362_mcfood.proposal_background.jpg");
	background-size:cover;
	background-position:center;
}

</j:jelly>
